titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

item.hi: Agreed to remit Geoffrey Heseldon's school fees.
" to confirm appointment of Dioc: Chancellor.
" that the disused Communion table, now in the chapter library might be placed in the Deanery Chapel.
Akeroyd attended, & made his declaration as lay–clerk.

p.hi: Watkins opposed the confirmation of the Chancellorship, & would have postponed it, but to this I refused assent, & put it to the vote, when it was carried with his sole dissent.
